description: I. Letter dated 10/03/2009 from Natasha Robinson, private secretary, Department of Transport, to Nick Bisson, chairman, UK Roads Liaison Group, regarding lessons for the management of local roads after the severe snowfalls in February 2009. 1 p. II. Lessons identified from the winter maintenance operations to clear public highways from obstructions caused by the severe weather experienced in early February 2009. 2 p.
